1.title: Tasmania: Part 1
1.plot: The first of 24 episodes, that takes viewers on journey into the ultimate feat of endurance within the Adventure Racing World Series.

2.title: Tasmania: Part 2
2.plot: The first 24hours of any Adventure Challenge on the World Stage is the toughest, lead teams push hard to open gaps that they feel will be hard to close down over the coming days.

3.title: Tasmania: Part 3
3.plot: We start by exploring the phenomenon of Sleep Monsters and discover there are more psychological challenges than physical challenges at this point.

4.title: Tasmania: Part 4
4.plot: For the teams this race has become an exercise in survival as they complete the marathon breaking trek and face more punishment. Tensions are stretched and the body and mind now reach new levels.

5.title: Ecuador: Part 1
5.plot: Ecuador comprises episodes 4 to 8 of 24 episode Wild Racers series, that takes viewers on a journey into the ultimate feat of endurance within the Adventure Racing World Series.

6.title: Ecuador: Part 2
6.plot: The first 24hours of any Adventure Challenge on the World Stage is the most brutal, lead teams work hard to open a lead that they feel will be hard to close down over the coming days.

7.title: Ecuador: Part 3
7.plot: Teams now finally surviving the most brutal first day in Adventure Racing history are welcomed by horizontal rain and some epic stages that will cause some extreme moments and life threatening situations.

8.title: Ecuador: Part 4
8.plot: From here on in the teams face an ever changing ecosystem as they head down from the dizzying heights and into he more tropical landscape that this regions is renowned for.

9.title: New Zealand: Part 1
9.plot: New Zealand comprises episodes 9 to 12 of 24 episode Wild Racers series, which takes viewers on journey into the ultimate feat of endurance within the Adventure Racing World Series.

10.title: New Zealand: Part 2
10.plot: The first 24hours of any Adventure Challenge on the World Stage is the most debilitating, the more experienced teams work hard to open a lead that they feel will be hard to close down over the coming days.

11.title: New Zealand: Part 3
11.plot: Following on from a staggering first day adventure, our teams now widely spread as a result of a blistering pace from the local New Zealand teams, face a formidable challenge.

12.title: New Zealand: Part 4
12.plot: The list of teams drastically on the decline, this challenging course has brought many to their knees. Those that have risen again have found newfound solace in the thought that the finish is in their sights.

13.title: Costa Rica: Part 1
13.plot: Costa Rica comprises episodes 13 to 8 of 16 episode Wild Racers series, that takes viewers on a journey into the ultimate feat of endurance within the Adventure Racing World Series.

14.title: Costa Rica: Part 2
14.plot: The first 24hours of any Adventure Challenge on the World Stage is the toughest, though in debilitating humidity and relentless sun, lead teams push hard to open gaps that they feel will be hard to close down over the coming days.

15.title: Costa Rica: Part 3
15.plot: Heading ever forward and following on from a brutal first day and night of racing our teams emerge from the jungle battered and bruised though in the true spirit of adventure push tirelessly onwards into the abyss.

16.title: Costa Rica: Part Four
16.plot: For those that have accepted the punishment at hand and relaxed under the considerable strain there is some respite at hand. Though racing through crocodile infested rivers and technical nigh time challenges is only for the self initiated.

17.title: South Africa: Part 1
17.plot: South Africa comprises episodes 17 to 8 of 20 episode Wild Racers series that takes viewers on a journey into the ultimate feat of endurance within the Adventure Racing World Series.

18.title: South Africa: Part 2
18.plot: The first 24hours of any Adventure Challenge on the World Stage is the toughest, lead teams push hard to open gaps that they feel will be hard to close down over the coming days. As they say when its go time - suffer.

19.title: South Africa: Part 3
19.plot: Our lead teams now push so hard that they lead by an entire leg, though it remains to be seen if they have pushed to hard to soon.

20.title: South Africa: Part 4
20.plot: For some the race has now become extremely tough. Finding ones limits is in itself a journey, so once put up against the challenges of racing under such conditions it is truly a real life drama.

21.title: Switzerland: Part 1
21.plot: Switzerland comprises episodes 20 to 24 of the Wild Racers series that takes viewers on a journey into the ultimate feat of endurance within the Adventure Racing World Series.

22.title: Switzerland: Part 2
22.plot: The first 24hours of any Adventure Challenge on the World Stage is always the toughest, lead teams push hard to open gaps that they feel will be hard to close down over the coming days.

23.title: Switzerland: Part 3
23.plot: Our lead teams have formed a forward charge so open gaps on the chasers. Though what lies ahead will break this lead group apart and create more of an expedition than a race.

24.title: Switzerland: Part 4
24.plot: With most of the field starting to question their own abilities, they begin to doubt how they will ever see the end of this enduring journey.

imdb.plot outline: 24-hours a day, for seven days straight, a host of international teams will race against the clock and against each other as they face the extreme challenges of the biggest adventure race on the planet. MavTV's exclusive series, Wild Racers will take viewers along for the ride as these exhausted and sleep-deprived teams climb mountains, cross swollen rivers, rappel into ravines and cross continents. Competing in the world's most extreme multi-continent adventure race, international teams will face enormous challenges as they race around the clock for seven straight days across some of the wildest terrain on earth. Exclusively airing on MavTV, this new series, Wild Racers, will define the very core of hardcore adventure racers as each team and each sleep-deprived individual competitor will be pushed way past their physical maximums and toward a finish line that seems impossibly far away.
imdb.title: Wild Racers
plot: This series takes viewers deep inside the world of international adventure racing, as competitors face endless challenges and fight exhaustion racing 24 hours a day for seven days straight, crossing the most challenging terrain on earth.::Tim Nash

24-hours a day, for seven days straight, a host of international teams will race against the clock and against each other as they face the extreme challenges of the biggest adventure race on the planet. MavTV's exclusive series, _Wild Racers_ (qv) will take viewers along for the ride as these exhausted and sleep-deprived teams climb mountains, cross swollen rivers, rappel into ravines and cross continents. Competing in the world's most extreme multi-continent adventure race, international teams will face enormous challenges as they race around the clock for seven straight days across some of the wildest terrain on earth. Exclusively airing on MavTV, this new series, _Wild Racers_ (qv), will define the very core of hardcore adventure racers as each team and each sleep-deprived individual competitor will be pushed way past their physical maximums and toward a finish line that seems impossibly far away.::Tim Nash
